entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kamouraska
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:20 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
